page.title: 04LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: On Monday evenings there is a computer class held in Moulton Village Hall.This takes place at 7.00 p.m. till 8.30 p.m.There are nine students from Moulton who go and people even go from East Layton and Gatherley.There are not many people who attend because you are expected to bring your own micros and televisions .The small number that do go range from 16 year olds to Old Age Pensioners. There used to be a Mixed Crafts Evening Class held in Moulton Village Hall until the Autumn of 1983.Then it failed to reach its minimum number of 8 students .Because of the competition for students from Skeeby and Middleton Tyas,which hold similar classes,it was decided not to put it on again.
